title: 'Toxic workplace culture' one of contributing factors that led to Titan submersible implosion
description: The implosion killed all five people on board the vessel, which disappeared on its maiden voyage to the Titanic in June 2023.
content:
A 'toxic workplace culture' was one of several contributing factors that led to the implosion of the Titan submersible on its way to the Titanic, a report has said.
The US Coast Guard Marine Board of Investigation (MBI) said in its Report of Investig... [1727 chars]

title: TV presenter Jay Blades charged with two counts of rape
description: Blades found fame on the furniture restoration programme The Repair Shop after he started presenting in 2017.
content:
TV presenter Jay Blades has been charged with two counts of rape, police have confirmed.
West Mercia Police said the 55-year-old is due to appear in court next week.

title: Tommy Robinson bailed after arrest on suspicion of grievous bodily harm
description: Far-right activist was detained at Luton airport on Monday a week after incident at St Pancras station in London
content:
The far-right activist known as Tommy Robinson has been released on bail by police after being arrested on suspicion of grievous bodily harm.
Robinson, 42, was detained on Monday evening at Luton airport after a man was allegedly assaulted at a Londo... [2096 chars]

title: Man killed in Stoke Newington shooting
description: A murder investigation is under way after the shooting in the early hours of Tuesday morning.
content:
A man has been killed in a shooting in north-east London.
The 45-year-old man was pronounced dead at the scene on Dynevor Road in Stoke Newington at about 00:20 BST on Tuesday. The area has been cordoned off and parts of Stoke Newington High Street r... [408 chars]

title: Ex-Arsenal footballer Thomas Partey in court on rape and sexual assault charges
description: Partey, 32, has been charged with five counts of rape and one of sexual assault and faces trial later this year
content:
The former Arsenal footballer Thomas Partey has appeared in court charged with six sexual offences.
The 32-year-old was bailed to appear at the Old Bailey for trial later this year over allegations of rape and sexual assault. During Tuesday’s brief h... [1474 chars]
